title: HUBER HUILLCA DIAZ - Your Adventure Guru
subtitle: Your Local Adventure Expert
description: Meet Huber Huillca Diaz, your expert adventure guide in Peru since 2005. Discover personalized tours to Machu Picchu, Sacred Valley, Rainbow Mountain and more.
intro: Welcome to Peru! I'm a certified trekking guide with over 18 years of experience leading adventurers through the breathtaking landscapes of the Peruvian Andes. Since 2005, I have been exploring the wonders of Peru, guiding adventurers like you through the breathtaking landscapes and rich cultural heritage of the southern Andes.

localExpertise.title: Local Expertise
localExpertise.description: Born in Cusco, I know every trail, every view, and every story. Fluent in Spanish, English, and Quechua (the ancient Inca language). Deep connections with local communities and authentic experiences.

personalizedAdventures.title: Personalized Adventures
personalizedAdventures.description: Flexible itineraries tailored to your interests and fitness level. Small groups or private tours for a more intimate experience. Can adapt any tour based on weather, your preferences, or special requests.

safetyProfessionalism.title: Safety & Professionalism
safetyProfessionalism.description: Certified wilderness first aid and mountain rescue training. Licensed by the Peruvian Ministry of Tourism. Comprehensive insurance and safety equipment always included.

passionateStoryteller.title: Passionate Storyteller
passionateStoryteller.description: I don't just show you places - I share the stories, legends, and history. Learn about Inca culture, local traditions, and modern Peruvian life. Connect with local families and communities along the way.

multiDayTrekking.title: Multi-Day Trekking
tours: Choquequirao Trek - My personal favorite hidden gem
Inca Trail to Machu Picchu - The classic adventure
Custom wilderness expeditions - Let's create something unique

dayAdventures.title: Day Adventures
tours: Sacred Valley exploration - Culture and archaeology combined
Cusco city tours - History comes alive in ancient streets

culturalImmersion.title: Cultural Immersion
tours: Home stays with local families in traditional villages
Cooking classes with authentic Peruvian cuisine

testimonials.text: Huber didn't just guide us through Peru - he opened our hearts to its soul. His knowledge, warmth, and flexibility made our trip absolutely unforgettable.
testimonials.author: Sarah & Mike

testimonials.text: We wanted something off the beaten path, and Huber delivered beyond our wildest dreams. The custom trek he designed was perfect for our family.
testimonials.author: The Johnson Family
